extension.name: System - Improved AJAX Login and Register
extension.author: Balint Polgarfi
extension.description: System - Improved AJAX Login and Register is a system plugin for AJAX Login and Registration. It's also able to override the default Joomla Login and Registration forms with Improved AJAX Login and Register.

field.name: override
field.label:
Override Login and
Registration pages:
field.description: Override the default Joomla Login and Registration forms with Improved AJAX Login & Register

field.name: autologin
field.label:
Auto login
after registration:
field.description: It only works when user activation is turned off at Users / User Manager / Options / New User Account Activation

field.name: generate
field.label: Generate Username from Email
field.description: If Username field not available, generate it from Email or use Email as Username
